array.string: IMP: In the screens 2 and 3 although your choices will not be shown highlighted at the same time but they will get selected
2.Choose the size and kind of mik you want
3.Choose the syrups,expresso (i.e. decaf,half caf,regular), expresso Shots
4.And your order is ready. All you need to is show the barrista your order from the QRCode generated with no confusion in order
